Android-Iconics will blow your mind :D

Android-Iconics is a library to use (almost) any alternative icon-font in your projects. It allows you to add any Android-Iconics compatible typeface-library-addon to your project and you are able to start using that font.
Android Google+ like floating action button which reacts on the list view scrolling events. Becomes visible when the list view is scrolled up and invisible when scrolled down.
Android Button which can morph to Circular Progress.
The MaterialDrawer library aims to provide the easiest possible implementation of a navigation drawer for your application.
